## Draft checklist

- [ ] Create draft file at `apps/janodetzel.com/content/blog/<slug>.md`
- [ ] Add frontmatter (title, description, date, tags, draft flag if used)
- [ ] Write introduction and conclusion
- [ ] Add at least one practical example/code snippet (if relevant)
- [ ] Add internal links to related posts/pages
- [ ] Proofread for clarity and grammar

## SEO and distribution

- [ ] Description/meta summary is concise and specific
- [ ] Title is clear and searchable
- [ ] Slug is short and descriptive
- [ ] Social share copy drafted

## Done criteria

- [ ] Content reviewed
- [ ] All checklists complete
- [ ] Ready to publish
